description: A pink-themed island in the Grand Line that serves as the home of the Kamabakka Kingdom, a society of okamas. The island is ruled by Emporio Ivankov, but in his absence, Caroline serves as substitute queen.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs Caroline Battle
keyEvents.description: The battle between Sanji and Caroline takes place on Momoiro Island, following Kamabakka Kingdom's unique fighting customs.
keyEvents.significance: The location's customs and fighting style play a crucial role in Sanji's humiliation and defeat.

keyEvents.title: Sanji's Transformation
keyEvents.description: After losing to Caroline, Sanji is transformed into an okama and runs on the beach with other okamas.
keyEvents.significance: Represents the complete influence of Momoiro Island's culture on Sanji at his lowest point.

culturalSignificance: Home of the Kamabakka Kingdom and birthplace of Newkama Kenpo martial arts. The island represents acceptance of gender fluidity and okama culture.

statusHistory.description: Functioning as the Kamabakka Kingdom with Caroline as substitute ruler

description: An island in South Blue sometimes called 'Treasure Island.' It features a huge tree growing in the middle where giant birds live. Despite appearing primitive, the inhabitants possess extensive knowledge of herbalism and medicine. The island is home to both human natives and giant Masukuredomo Goayu Birds.

keyEvents.title: Chopper on Torino Kingdom
keyEvents.description: The episode shows Chopper's activities on Torino Kingdom, caring for a giant baby bird.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Chopper's location during the crew's separation and his relationship with the island's creatures.

keyEvents.title: Giant Birds vs Natives Conflict
keyEvents.description: A battle erupts between the giant Masukuredomo Goayu Birds and the native inhabitants of Torino Kingdom.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the ongoing conflict between the two groups and sets up Chopper's future role as peacemaker.

geographicFeatures: Huge tree in the center of the island
culturalSignificance: Home to advanced medical and herbal knowledge despite primitive appearance. The conflict between humans and giant birds represents the need for understanding between different species.

statusHistory.description: Island inhabited by both natives and giant birds in conflict

historicalEvents.event: Bartholomew Kuma visited seeking cure for Sapphire Scales
historicalEvents.description: Four years before the main timeline, Kuma visited the island seeking medical knowledge
historicalEvents.significance: Establishes the island's reputation for advanced medical knowledge
